title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Kneey's house, day. Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny sit around a Monopoly-type board game in Kenny's room

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Okay, Stan, I'm gonna you... a UFO crash-landing card!  You can deny it, or cover it up.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Dude, I don't understand this game at all.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: It's "Investigative Reports with Bill Curtis" funtime game. You have to decide if you deny it or cover it up.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Um, deny it?

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Okay, let's see what Bill Curtis says.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Hello, I'm Bill Curtis. Many believe that the U.S. Government... covered it up. I'm Bill Curtis.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Alright, Cartman. I'm gonna give you... a jail-time card.  You lose a turn.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Sweet.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Oh yeah?! Well, I'm gonna give you... AIDS!

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: What?

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: I just gave you AIDS.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: AIDS?!

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Dude, that's not cool. Don't give Kyle AIDS.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Kyle has AIDS, and now loses 47 turns and 800 points.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Kenny, your dad and I are thinking about having another baby. Wouldn't you like to have another brother or sister?

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: (No.)

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: We just might get workin' on it later tonight, huh huh huh.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: God-damnit, poor people suck! Your family is already on welfare, and now they're gonna bring another kid into the world. Poor people are turning out babies, adding to the overpopulation, and they're expecting me to pay for it with my tax dollars.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: You don't pay tax dollars, Cartman! You're eight!

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: ...You see.  Gaw, this is just what I've been talkin' about! I can't even relate to you guys anymore because you're too immature!

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: What?

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: I've gotta start hanging out with friends that are a little more intelligent, and understand ...politics and stuff. It's just that... I'm up on this level up here , and all my friends are down here .

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: You don't know what you're talking about, fatass!

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Nononono! Me h'myah , you guys myah! Â— maybe a little mo down, down in hyah. SCREW YOU GUYS, I'M GOING HOME.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: I'm Bill Curtis.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Cartman's house, a few minutes later. Cartman paces the floor in his room. Next to him is a computer

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: I've outgrown all my friends. I need to meet more mature people, Clyde Frog. Oh, great idea, Clyde Frog!  I can meet new friends on the Internet!  Here's a chat room: "Men Who Like Young Boys" That's perfect.  Hi everybody! I am a young boy seeking an older male for good times. I am eight years old and would li-  Wow! Look at all these guys who wanna be my friend! I'll pick... Tony316. Hi Tony.  "So what are you into?" Oh, you know, the usual stuff. Smiley-face. "Kewl. Wanna get together?  Smiley-face?" Sure, Tony! That would be... kewl. Winking, smiley, face.  "Meet me at Mel's Buffet restaurant tomorrow morning."  Sounds good. See you then! Clown hat, curly hair, smiley-face.  You see that, Clyde Frog? Tomorrow I'm gaonna meet my first mature friend!

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: The South Park docks, day. Cartman walks towards the end, where a man in trench coat and baseball cap looks out over the water.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: South Park Inn, day. Schmaltzy music plays as the camera looks at a large sign that says "I LOVE NAMBLA HONORARY DINNER" and has a picture of Eric posing under a spotlight at its center. Present in the ballroom are Cartman, Butters, several other boys, and the men they've partnered up with. The doors open and in walk Stan and Kyle, with their partners.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: What the hell?  Hey, what the hell are you guys doing here?! This is for mature people only!

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: We got invited too, fatass

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Hunh.  Well, I guess nowadays, they allow any old schmucks into NAMBLA.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Fellow NAMBLA members, it is great to see you all here. It seems like we have finally found a city that won't oppress us.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: First and foremost, I wanna recognize Eric Cartman, for putting us in touch with all of you pretty, young boys.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Thank you. Thank you very much.  Thank you.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Now, I know that many of us have already found partners in this fahine city, and I'd like to take a minute to hear some testimonials from members.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: This is boring.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Yeah.  HEY, WHEN ARE WE GONNA GET TO SOME ACTION, HUH?

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Ho hohohoho

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Woohoohoohoohoo.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Ho, goodness! What a gift from God! Aha ha, we'll... "get" ...to it very soon, I assure you. But first, I'd just like to hear from a couple of you on your progress. Uh yes, Patrick.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Uh I, I found a little eight-year-old named Buttehers. He's a beautiful , bright, little boy.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Well, uh I sure am, I guess.

text: And his skin is as soft as fresh linen.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: That seems kind of... weird.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Well, my skin is ssspringtime sssoft, I suppose.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Wonderful, heh hn. And how about you, Mr. Harris?

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Well, I want to announce that I may have found the dream boy of the decade. He's sexy, sassy, and full of spunk. His name is Timmy.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: TIMMMIHH, tih, Timmih?

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Wuhell, members, I know we're all eager to get acquainted with our new partners and, so why don't we turn down the lights and start to dance!

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Alright, I want those perverted bastards all taken in. Got it?

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Got it!

text: Hello, NAMBLA members. As the South Park representative-

text: Hold it right there!

text: Freeze!

text: Don't nobody move!

text: What's going on?

text: Alright, sickos. Where are the children?!

text: What children?

text: This... is... NAMBLA, right?

text: Yes.

text: The North American Man/Boy Love Association?

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: What? No!  We're the North American Marlon Brando Look-Alikes.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Aw, crap! We got the wrong NAMBLA.

text: Aw, damnit, I'm in the wrong place.

text: Yeah, those perverted bastards!

text: Wow. You guys really do look a lot like Marlon Brando.

text: Thank you. Now, let's go get those othe NAMBLA bastards before they hurt any of South Park's children!

text: Yeah! Yeah!

text: And let's kick their asses for stealin' our domain name!

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!

text: Alright, members, that's enough of that.  It's time for all of us to retire to our respective rooms, and get to know our new young boys.

text: Dude! We're surrounded by perverts.

text: Well, Cartman, you got everybody into this, you have to figure out a way to get everybody out.

text: Yeah.

text: How?

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Well, look. Those perverts aren't going to rest until they've made love to one of us. Right? So,... somebody's just gonna have to go out there and and... take one for the team.  And I think, in all fairness, it should be Butters.

text: Huh?? Uh-uh well, huh, why me?

text: Now, are you a team player or not?!

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: South Park Inn, outside. The inn has been cleared, so everyone stands outside. An ambulance awaits a victim, who is soon on a stretcher

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Are you alright, Stuart?

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Don't touch me! I've had my nuts broken, body poisoned, have been made love to in the ass by three dozen 40-year-old menÂ—I just wanna go home and take a, a hot bath!

text: We've been after you for a long time, buddy! Do you know your rights?

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Rights? Does anybody know their rights? You see, I've learned something today. Our forefathers came to this country because... they believed in an idea. An idea called "freedom." They wanted to live in a place where a group couldn't be prosecuted for their beliefs. Where a person can live the way he chooses to live.  You see us as being perverted because we're different from you. People are afraid of us, because they don't understand. And sometimes it's easier to persecute than to understand.

title: CARTMAN JOINS NAMBLA
text: Dude. You have sex with children.

text: We are human. Most of us didn't even choose to be attracted to young boys. We were born that way. We can't help the way we are, and if you all can't understand that, well, then, I guess you'll just have to put us away.

text: Dude. You have sex with children.

text: Yeah. You know, we believe in equality for everybody, and tolerance, and all that gay stuff, but dude, fuck you.

text: Seriously.

text: Well, Cartman
